name: Banana Blossom Beef Sisig
description: Dive into a healthier, low-carb, and low-sugar version of the classic Filipino dish with our Banana Blossom Beef Sisig. Made with the natural sweetness of banana blossoms and lean beef cubes, this recipe is perfect for anyone looking to enjoy traditional flavors in a more health-conscious way. Perfect for fans of healthy recipes looking for a new culinary adventure.
recipeIngredient: 0.50 medium (approx 2-3/4" long, 2-1/2" dia), Peppers, sweet, green, raw

recipeInstructions.text: Begin by chopping the red onion, cutting the banana blossom into small pieces, dicing the green pepper, slicing the spring onion, and mincing the garlic cloves.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Boil the banana blossom for 10 minutes until tender, then drain and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and cook for 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Increase the heat to medium-high and add the beef cubes. Cook for 5 minutes, or until the beef is browned.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chopped red onion and diced green pepper to the pan. Cook for another 5 minutes until the vegetables are tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in the boiled banana blossom and continue cooking for an additional 5 minutes, ensuring everything is heated through and well-mixed.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with sliced spring onions before serving hot.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
